text: Kiril Metkov (born February 1, 1965) is a former Bulgarian football player. He has played for the Bulgarian national team as an attacking midfielder. ==Statistics== ===Club career statistics=== |- |1993||rowspan="2"|Gamba Osaka||rowspan="2"|J.
